title: Font ID | Old time hammered type font
author: zerimar3

comments.content:
Hello  
Please check for FIRESTONE&ROBERTSON:  
 [http://myfonts.us/OQr0uV](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829164450/http:/myfonts.us/OQr0uV "http://myfonts.us/OQr0uV")  
Alex

FIRESTONE & ROBERTSON DISTILLING CO.: [Aviano Slab](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829164450/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/insigne/aviano-slab) by Insigne Jeremy Dooley  
CELEBRATE LEGENDARY: already tried to identify unsuccessfully in one of your previous request. My first thought was [Mrs Eaves](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829164450/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/mrs-eaves-ot) (don't know too many serif /R with such a straight leg...), that could be it... or not... So, part of this risky suggestion, without providing a better sample (or the origin), I'm afraid it'd be hard to suggest more...

Thanks for the help! Ryuk, the image with that font can be seen here:  
 [http://darrincrescenzi.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/08/287logo-1032x774.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829164450/http:/darrincrescenzi.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/08/287logo-1032x774.jpg "http://darrincrescenzi.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/08/287logo-1032x774.jpg")

It might be a tad larger than the one posted. Any further leads to this font is highly appreciated.

Thank you!
Sorry, can't help more for this one. The only thing I could say is, at this size, it doesn't look like Mrs Eaves anymore.
